terms.definition: Observer Global Impression - Considering all the ways your condition impacts you, how severe is your condition at this time?
Observer Global Impression - Compared to <previously assessed protocol specified time point> how much has your condition changed?
Observer Global Impression - Compared to <previously assessed protocol specified time point> how much has your condition improved?
